Platform_Hwapi_Shared Struct Reference

Structure in shared memory that is used by all HSP related APIs. This structure will be placed at the end of shared memory. More...

#include <platform_hwapi_shared.h>

uint16_t encryptedCmdPktCnt
 

Detailed Description

Structure in shared memory that is used by all HSP related APIs. This structure will be placed at the end of shared memory.

Member Data Documentation

uint16_t Platform_Hwapi_Shared::encryptedCmdPktCnt

Count of encrypted payloads received from mailbox (excludes encrypted 1SP)

Mbx_cmd_pkt_t Platform_Hwapi_Shared::encryptedCmdPktList[CMD_PKT_BUFF_SIZE]

List of all Command Packets corresponding to encrypted RAM data packets

uint16_t Platform_Hwapi_Shared::encryptedDataFlag

Flag to indicate that encrypted data is stored in the RAMs
